name: Growth (Its_Just_Nick)
description:
This is a very short game experience called Growth. This game was created for the 230th Weekly Game Jam Competition in which the theme for the week was" Growing Up."

All of the assests other than the texture from google images have all been created by me. This includes the models, sounds and design.

Controls

  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to Look Around
  • LMB to Interact
